member.name: AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE
member.summary: Specifies the type of an audio system effects property store.

member.name: AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE.AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE_DEFAULT
member.summary: Default property store. Contains custom effects properties and is populated from the INF file. Properties will not be persisted across OS upgrades.

member.name: AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE.AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE_USER
member.summary: User property store. Contains user settings pertaining to effects properties and will be persisted by the OS across upgrades and migrations.

member.name: AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE.AUDIO_SYSTEMEFFECTS_PROPERTYSTORE_TYPE_VOLATILE
member.summary: The volatile property store. Contains audio effects properties that are lost on device reboot. The store is cleared each time the endpoint transitions to active
